title: news.com.au — Australia’s #1 news site
text: NSW Shadow Treasurer Walt Secord fears his party is moving too far to the left and needs better economic direction. “I believe we need a nuanced approach to the party; we have to balance environmental concerns but we also have to protect jobs and investment and have a stable economy and make sure we keep the lights on,” he told Sky News on Monday. “This is about putting the best policies forward for the 2023 election, we can’t just ban everything. “Mining, for example, is part of the NSW and Australian economy,” he said.
description: Watch the Latest News.com.au Videos including Featured News Videos and Sports Videos and News Highlights. View more News.com.au Videos and Breaking News and Featured Entertainment Videos online at News.com.au
